select
DATE_FORMAT(date, '%Y-%m-%d')
DATE_FORMAT(date, '%Y-%m')
DATE_FORMAT(date, '%Y') as date ,sum(number) number, totalPeople
from res_addVip
from res_addVip_cd
where date between DATE_FORMAT(#{start},'%Y-%m-%d') and DATE_FORMAT(#{end},'%Y-%m-%d')
group by 1 order by date

select totalPeople
from res_addVip
from res_addVip_cd
group by 1 order by date desc limit 1

select sum(one)+sum(two)+sum(three)+sum(four)+sum(five)+sum(overfive)
from res_vipLiveness
from res_vipLiveness_cd
group by month order by month desc limit 1
